Note: The user / PT mentioned that personally they didn’t mind not having a display in the glasses . And that for ease of use they would prefer the gen2 as opposed to the other. They did like that the gen2 glasses were lightweight and mentioned that it felt like a regular glasses.
One thing we noticed while capturing photos was an offset with closeup photos.

The user / PT mentioned they felt like the gen2 glasses gave way information in terms of the ai responses. In their words “ it was more talkative” . They wanted to be able to have a conversation with another person while still listening to a given response.
